text: Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho ezwa (uNkosikazi ka-Al-Azizi) ukugxekwa ngabesifazane wathumela ukuba balandwe, futhi wabalungiselela idili wayesebanika bonke abesifazane ngamunyeummesewayesethi(unkosikazika-Al-AzizikuJosefa) “phumela kubona ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sebembona bamphakamisa (ngobuhle bakhe bamangala) futhi bazisika izandla zabo base” bethi “ukuphelela kungokukaMvelinqangi! Akusiyena umuntu lona ngaphandle kokuthi uyingelosi enkulu.”
